name: Dragon Lore 2: The Heart of the Dragon Man

description:
Dragon Lore 2: The Heart of the Dragon Man is a RPG game developed by Cryo Interactive Entertainment. It came out on 01-07-1997. It was published by Cryo Interactive Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Dragon Lore 2: The Heart of the Dragon Man on PC.
